tool_description: Find the gender by just using a name.
name: Gender From Name
title: Gender From Name

api_list.name: getGender
api_list.description: Finds the gender from over 100,000 (first) names.  Supports name variants as well.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gender-from-name.p.rapidapi.com/gender/Jane"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gender-from-name.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gender-from-name.p.rapidapi.com/gender/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gender-from-name.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
